Package grafioschtrader.reports

Class WatchlistReport

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.reports.WatchlistReport
@Component public class WatchlistReport extends Object
Prepares the Data for every kind of Watchlists.

  • Method Details

    • getWatchlistWithoutUpdateAndMaxHistoryquote

      public SecuritycurrencyGroup getWatchlistWithoutUpdateAndMaxHistoryquote(Integer idWatchlist) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Returns the watchlist with the youngest date of history quote. This should help to detect non working historical data feeds.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
      ExecutionException

    • getWatchlistForSplitAndDividend

      public SecuritycurrencyGroup getWatchlistForSplitAndDividend(Integer idWatchlist) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Return of the split and dividend watchlist. Retrieves a watchlist and marks securities within it if they have ever had a dividend or split event. This method does not fetch the actual dividend or split records, only an indication of their existence. It also marks instruments if they are referenced in transactions or other watchlists.
      Parameters:
      idWatchlist - The ID of the watchlist.
      Returns:
      A SecuritycurrencyGroup where securities are marked if they have dividend/split history and usage flags.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
      ExecutionException

    • getWatchlistWithUDFData

      public SecuritycurrencyUDFGroup getWatchlistWithUDFData(Integer idWatchlist) throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException
      Retrieves a watchlist and enriches its instruments with User Defined Fields (UDF) data relevant to the currently authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      idWatchlist - The ID of the watchlist.
      Returns:
      A SecuritycurrencyUDFGroup containing the watchlist instruments along with their UDF data.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
      ExecutionException

    • getWatchlistWithoutUpdate

      public SecuritycurrencyGroup getWatchlistWithoutUpdate(Integer idWatchlist)

    • getWatchlistwithPeriodPerformance

      @Transactional @Modifying public SecuritycurrencyGroup getWatchlistwithPeriodPerformance(Integer idWatchlist, Integer idTenant, Integer daysTimeFrame)
      Retrieves a watchlist and calculates period-specific performance metrics for its instruments, including daily change, year-to-date (YTD) change, and change over a specified time frame. This method may trigger an update of the last prices for the instruments if the cached prices are considered stale.
      Parameters:
      idWatchlist - The ID of the watchlist.
      idTenant - The ID of the tenant to whom the watchlist belongs.
      daysTimeFrame - The number of days for the custom time frame performance calculation (e.g., 30 for 30-day performance).
      Returns:
      A SecuritycurrencyGroup enriched with performance data for each instrument.
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the watchlist does not belong to the specified tenant.
